title: The Crimea - Tragedy Rocks - slavetothesound FLAC
description:
It&#039;s been probably a year and a half since I played through this album and still parts of it pop back into my head every once in a while. Some of this album is catchy as hell in a really strange way. It&#039;s not easy to describe this album as there&#039;s no other band I know of that has the same style. I could call it "shimmery" I suppose... that captures it better than anything else I can think of. It&#039;s like a fun house of crazy mirrors while on LSD playing  British pop-rock music.

White Russian Galaxy, Lottery Winners on Acid, and Girl Just Died are three that constantly and incessantly come back to me.  You really must listen to these tracks.  Don&#039;t expect the whole album to be absolutely great, there are plenty of just average moments in there, but even then they&#039;re different enough to get some enjoyment out of them for at least a listen or two.

10. Howling at the Moon    [0:02:48.47]

13. Gazillions of Minature Violins    [0:04:00.65]
14. Someone&#039;s Crying    [0:04:59.18]

If this is something that you like, then go to their website and download their newer album. They released it for free online in mp3(It was there last time I checked)  - Have fun!

"[i]If you wanna see my happy side, better tell me that my girl just died...[/i]" - Dammit! -slavetothesound
